profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

username.username_description: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language.

email.email_description: You can update your email address below. Be sure to verify your email address to receive our notifications.

language.language_description: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.

profile_update.profile_update_description: Changes have been made to your account.
